properties.sfomuseum:description: Handwritten letter from Harold M. Bixby to his wife, Debby Bixby, dated Sunday, [October 1, 1933]; includes description of CNAC’s stockholders meeting, meetings with minister of communications [Chu Chia-hua] and later [William] Grooch, [K.C.] Huang, and Dai [Enki]; approval of the contracts from Minister Chu, sending a cable to New York [Juan Trippe, Stokely W. Morgan, and Young] about the deal; includes description of the deal; next steps in Manila and Hong Kong; mentions Miss Forbes, [George] Sellett.
properties.wof:name: correspondence: Harold M. Bixby to Debby Bixby
